devices.title: Iphone 12
devices.detailed_description: Equipped with a super-fast A14 Bionic processor that processes over a trillion operations per second. Allows you to take professional-quality photos as well as bright and rich night photos

devices.title: Redmi AirDots
devices.detailed_description: Compact and almost weightless headphones. Equipped with multifunctional buttons, which are located on the inserts.

devices.title: Samsung Galaxy Tab S6 Lite
devices.detailed_description: This is a very long description of a very bad tablet

devices.title: Macbook Air M1 2020
devices.detailed_description: Still compact and lightweight. It gets the job done quickly with the amazing speed of an 8-core processor

devices.title: Samsung Galaxy S21
devices.detailed_description: Capture stunning 8K photos and videos, and capture stunningly clear 33MP photos directly from your video footage. A revolutionary camera, the fastest processor and a powerful battery that lasts all day

devices.title: Apple AirPods
devices.detailed_description: More than a day of music playback in high quality. Headphones independently and incredibly quickly establish a connection and set up for work.

devices.title: Acer Extensa EX215-52
devices.detailed_description: The combination of modern technical solutions and workmanship with an affordable price tag surprises even experienced users. If you need a device for the maximum range of tasks, then this model will be an excellent candidate for purchase.

devices.title: Xiaomi Redmi Note 9 Pro
devices.detailed_description: It will allow you to always be in touch: take photos, chat, watch videos, listen to music, play games, and all this for many hours in a row.

devices.title: Apple Watch SE
devices.detailed_description: Combination of bright modern style and high functionality. The watch monitors your well-being and helps you always stay in touch.

feedbacks.name: Harry
feedbacks.feedback: The best shop I have ever seen

feedbacks.name: Bill
feedbacks.feedback: Great shop with really great website
